projects.name: Network Scanner

about.summary: I combine web development and data science to build smart solutions.
about.content: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist with a passion for creating efficient and scalable web applications. My expertise spans both frontend and backend development, as well as data analysis and machine learning. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to take on new challenges that push the boundaries of technology.

educations.details: Specialized in data analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies.
Focused on improving English language skills for academic and professional purposes.
Comprehensive training in frontend and backend web development technologies.
Learning advanced techniques in ethical hacking and cybersecurity.
